results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-7d87445ddc-qzb2f Pod/wordpress-7d87445ddc-fftrl], expected 2

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the expected 2 pods are not ready.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Verify readiness probes in pod specs. 4. Ensure service and pod labels match. 5. Restart pods if needed.

results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-7d87445ddc-fftrl

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
